blurb: Measurements like these act as signposts that signal our current is strong. I can keep the details quiet in the background so the creative work can breathe. We'll tune thresholds to your comfort and cadence.
metrics: Bi-weekly meetings occur on rhythm with decisions logged in Asana
Weekly newsletter pre-scheduled; social posts queued 1 week ahead
Calendar confirmations sent 48+ hours in advance; no-show rate <5%
